text: Mothers don't let your daughters grow up to be models unless you're present.
author: Janice Dickinson

text: I owe much to mother. She had an expert's understanding, but also approached art emotionally.
author: David Rockefeller

text: A woman must combine the role of mother, wife and politician.
author: Emma Bonino

text: I wish my mother had left me something about how she felt growing up. I wish my grandmother had done the same. I wanted my girls to know me.
author: Carol Burnett

text: My mother taught me that we all have the power to achieve our dreams. What I lacked was the courage.
author: Clay Aiken
